divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were traveling south along the lakeshore (lake michigan) just out for a nice romantic ride by this lake. as we were approaching 75th street, i noticed an orange light in the sky to the south west. it is important to note that the light was stationary (appeared to be hovering like a helicopter)and was not blinking at all. i know that all air craft have red blinking lights for safety reasons, this did not, that and the orange color is what got my attention originally. i alerted my wife to the object and she actually stopped the car. i quickly exited the vehicle and noted that the object made no noise and had now began to move in a semi-circular trajectory. i grabbed my cell phone and flipped on my video recorder, unfortunately i was unable to get any footage do to my excitement i forgot to press record, that said after approximately 10 seconds i realized that my video recorder was useless anyway showing only a speck of light here and there, i was able to follow were it was going but that's about it. so i lowered the camera and notice the object had moved to a position directly west of where i was. so up to this point it had did the semi-circle and after that headed due north to end up directly west of my position. at this point the light then began to ascend (but not at a very drastic angle) in a north west to north-north west bearing. the speed was incredible within 3-5 seconds it was out of sight! during the sighting i was very excited, and awe struck. after the sighting i am left with questions. i would like mufon to look into our local airports radar (if possible) to see if they had anything "unidentified" that night. i mentioned my wife was very skeptical about ufo's but she could not deny that what we seen was not any conventional aircraft and therefore is\was a ufo. i believe it is important to note that roughly 1 minute after the sighting a commercial aircraft flew overhead at a low altitude with 3-4 red blinking lights and several white lights under the wings. this is drastically different from what we had witnessed only moments before. if necessary i would undergo a polygraph examination to what i witnessed. antonio m. jacob
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Kenosha
There were no other sightings in Kenosha on or around August 18th 2013
Summary: My wife and I seen an orange light in the sky. My wife was a strong skeptic in UFO's, now her witnessing this event has wavered her skepticism.
